DOC.detailed_description: The current allergy diagnostic reagent house dust mite market USA 10,000 AU/ml . This base IDEAL50 concept put forth Turkeltaub et al , almost 3 decade ago . Such concentration show give large degree false positive even US population . In Thailand , anecdotally observed concentration , size positive test among atopic subject quite large could lead discomfort possible anaphylaxis certain allergic individual . Moreover , 40 % normal individual could give positive reaction concentration . It therefore desirable reexamine appropriate concentration diagnostic reagent house dust mites among Thai population main objective research .
